name: EvilBots Part1
description:
Thousands of Evil Bots released all over the world, by a crazy Scientist. They shoot and kill everything that moves. They can sense you from pretty large distance. 

Soldier receives an alert about a group of Evil Bots near his locality. There should be 15-25 of them. Try to shoot them from a long distance, trust me you don't want to get close to them. Use your radar to identify the bots location and destroy them.

Controls:

W,A,S,D  'or'  Arrow Keys - Movement

Shift - Move fast

Space - Jump

Mouse Left click - Shoot

Mouse Right click - Weapon Zoom

Credits:

* Unity Micro-FPS Asset

* Survival old house from unity Asset store - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/survival-old-house-5...
